entry.title: FIORI Sales order creation Version vs. GUI VA01
entry.content:
Hello SCN,

unfortunately, I was not able to find the corresponding clue on this.

Why is the behavior in Sales Order Management – Version 2, or when navigating to "Create Sales Order" [not the VA01- GUI], so different?

When I start via F3893 → "New Sales Order," I noticed the following differences:

  • No pop-up for material substitution

  • No pop-up for “partial confirmation” or availability check

Did I click something wrong, or is this really the case?

Is there a list of the differences?

Thanks!

entry.title: BAS on premise deployment errors for recently created projects
entry.content:
Hi All, 

Strangely I am facing some deployment issues using BAS, which is not the case till few weeks before.

error abap-deploy-task ZZ_FIOR_POC An exception with the type /UI5/CX_APP_API_INVALID _INPUT was raised, but was not handled locally or declared in a RAISING clause.
error abap-deploy-task ZZ_FIOR_POC Path /sap.app/i18n is not adressing a simple type (string, number, boolean, null)  .

For the first deployment it is giving above errors but deployment is happening , but can't access the app from FLP.

second time onwards deployment is failing with same errors, any clues are much appreciated.

Thanks

entry.title: Smartfield with search help and external parameter
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I have a query about some development work. I created a smart field in an XML view. This smart field contains warehouse data. This information depends on the 'Plant' field.

When the search help is opened, the view receives the data from the plant field and filters the warehouse for this plant, which is fine so far.

However, when I select a warehouse code, for example 'AACC', the search help closes and the backend is called to verify the selected value. During this process, the front end does not send the plant value to the back end. Consequently, the system retrieves a lot of warehouses with the code 'AACC'. The system then returns an error message.

What can I do to solve the problem?

Thank you so much!

entry.title: TreeTable in sapui5 - Expand collapse option not showing for Data in table
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Controller

--

Controller Code

 

onGLItem: function () {

var Nodes = [

{

NodeID: 1,

HierarchyLevel: 0,

Description: "1",

ParentNodeID: null,

DrillState: "expanded"

},

{

NodeID: 2,

HierarchyLevel: 1,

Description: "1.1",

ParentNodeID: 1,

DrillState: "leaf"

}

]

let OModel = new sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel({nodes: Nodes});

this.getView().setModel(OModel,"oflatTreeData");

<TreeTable
id="treeTable"
selectionMode="Single"
enableColumnReordering="false"
rows="{
path : 'oflatTreeData>/',
parameters : {
countMode: 'Inline',
treeAnnotationProperties : {
hierarchyLevelFor : 'HierarchyLevel',
hierarchyNodeFor : 'NodeID',
hierarchyParentNodeFor : 'ParentNodeID',
hierarchyDrillStateFor : 'DrillState'
}
}
}">

------

I have binded the data and display data in tabular level, but its not showing arrow mark with expand/collapse..

Why its not working, please help me

I referred sapui5 demo kit - https://sapui5.hana.ondemand.com/#/entity/sap.ui.table.TreeTable/sample/sap.ui.table.sample.TreeTable.BasicODataTreeBinding

 

Thanks

Madhava

entry.title: Integrating Cluster TY Data (PCL1) with Infotype 3671 (A1 Notification) in a Custom Fiori App
entry.content:
We are planning to develop a custom Fiori application “A1 Notification” in the ESS area in Austria, allowing employees to create A1 applications directly in the Fiori UI (including Subtype E2 – Multi-country assignments).

When creating a new A1 application with Subtype E2, multiple countries need to be specified. These country details are not stored in Infotype 3671 but are instead saved in Cluster TY (PCL1). Our goal is to store both the infotype data and the country information (cluster data) consistently and make them visible in IT3671. After insert a new Entry using FuBa HR_CONTROL_INFTY_OPERATION, the country information is not recognized or displayed in the infotype. According to our research, there is no official function module or BAPI that allows the simultaneous processing of IT3671 and Cluster TY including the 'cluster_guid'.

Questions:

  1. Does SAP provide a recommended approach or an internal API/BAPI for the correct processing of this data combination (Infotype + Cluster TY) for Subtype E2?

  2. How can it be ensured that the country information stored in the cluster is correctly linked to and displayed in Infotype 3671?

  3. Does SAP perhaps provide an example of such an implementation (e.g., from the standard ESS/MSS) that could be used as a reference?

Thanks for your Support!

entry.title: A document containing all steps needed to complate a business process/ flow in fiori
entry.content: which fiori apps and in what order will i need for example to do AP or AR process or asset accounting.

entry.title: RAP - Managed with Unmanaged Save
entry.content:
I know RAP supports Managed with Unmanaged Save scenarios, but in our case we seem to need the opposite.

Our main table is the standard Equipment Master which has to be updated using BAPIs, and we need to create a log table Z_AUDIT to log any changes made to the standard Equipment. So the main entity is the standard I_Equipment, and the new associated z entity is ZI_Equipment_Audit. 

How would you model the RAP root entry view?

define root view entity ZI_Equipment_Audit as 
  select from I_Equipment as Equip
    composition [1..*] of ZI_Audit as _Audit

We need a Managed behaviour for the Audit entity and Unmanaged for the root I_Equipment, because BAPI's are needed to update the standard Equipment master tables. That is not supported by RAP.

What would you suggest in this case?

Thanks

I am trying to migrate project from custom UI5 application from webIDE to BAS and trying to deploy into on-premise system.  Getting 404 error while deploying.

error abap-deploy-task ZXXX Folder webapp has children and can't be deleted

Did anyone faced similar issue?

 

Thanks

Shankar

entry.title: S/4HANA Public Cloud 2502: Custom tile for Custom UI5 application with parameters
entry.content:
Dear SAP experts,

I have an issue with the Fiori app Display Line Item Entry (F2218) , which does not accept the URL parameters "P_FromPostingDate" and "P_ToPostingDate".

In on-premise systems I was able to solve this by creating a new tile as a copy of the standard one and adding the required parameters.

The problem is that in S/4HANA Public Cloud there is no SAP Fiori Launchpad Designer, so I cannot create a new tile in this way.

I used the following reference to create a Custom Tile, but this only works for external applications and does not allow me to add new parameters.

¿How can I create a tile with parameters in S/4HANA Public Cloud 2502?

Thank you very much.

Best regards,

entry.title: Documentation for DDIC tables of the DRC module
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

We need to display the contents of our VAT return transactions in DRC and those without DRC (i.e. from the old content FI-GL-GL-F) in a single custom query. This means, for example, that the contents of Fiori F1515 ‘Run Statutory Reports’ – as shown here – must be displayed

The tables from FI-GL-GL-F that are needed to display this are known (FOTTDCLNOT, FOTDECLSTA, etc.), but the only one from DRC appears to be SRF_REP_RUN_DATA. However, there is currently no documentation on how this table is linked to individual transactions. Does anyone have any experience with this and know how we could move forward?
Best regards, Martin

Anybody knows in which tables the Fiori bookmarks are stored?

Thanks for your help

JD

entry.title: Fallback method for opening web applications in iframe if loading fails
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am trying to implement a fallback mechanism for opening a web application inside an iframe. If the app fails to load in the iframe, I want to automatically open it in a new browser tab.

Here’s are the implementations that I have tried so far, I am providing a brute code of the methods that I have tried implementing:

onTilePress: function (oEvent) {
    var sUrl = oEvent.getSource().getBindingContext("appModel").getProperty("url");
    var oFrame = this.byId("appFrame");

    // attachAfterRendering for iframe handling
    oFrame.attachAfterRendering({ url: sUrl }, function (oEvent, oData) {
        var iframe = document.querySelector("iframe");

        if (!iframe) {
            console.error("Iframe not found");
            return;
        }

        // Listen for load success/failure
        iframe.onload = function () {
            console.log("App loaded successfully in iframe");
        };

        iframe.onerror = function () {
            console.error("Error loading app in iframe, opening in new tab");
            window.open(oData.url, "_blank");
        };

        // Safety fallback - message event listener
        window.addEventListener("message", function (e) {
            console.log("Message received from origin:", e.origin);
            // Expected origin is from embedded app, but I only get the portal origin here
        });

        // Detach afterrendering after execution
        oFrame.detachAfterRendering();
    });
}

 

Challenges I am facing:

  1. iframe.onload and iframe.onerror are never triggered – not even for successful apps.

  2. onAfterRendering only detects the UI5 HTML control render, not the internal iframe load state.

  3. When listening for postMessage, I get the custom portal origin (e.g., https://port8081-workspaces...) instead of the embedded app’s origin, so I cannot distinguish failures correctly.


    Can someone please help me to find a correct way to detect if an app inside an iframe has failed to load in SAP UI5 (so that I can implement a proper fallback to open it in a new tab)?
    Also suggest if is there a recommended UI5 mechanism to achieve this?

    Thanks in advance,
    Sai Krishna.

entry.title: User status without status number box is greyed out in WebUI - Change PM Order
entry.content:
System allows to set User Status without status number in IW32 normally, but in Fiori - Change PM Order, the boxes are greyed out and it can't be changed, even with SAP_ALL, SAP_NEW, so it is not an authorization error. All the necessary business functions are enabled.

IW32

Fiori

entry.title: SAP custom analytical queries authorization
entry.content:
Hello Guys,

I am quite new to fiori. 

I've created a query in the custom analytical queries fiori application.
I've published the query and it is accessable from business user but when he launches the query it says the user does not have right for the analytical CDS view.

 

I do not have clue at the moment what kind of authorizations are missing I've checked SU53 on the user but to me these does not seems to be the real missing rights and on the CDS view there are no authorization check turned on in the annotation so I am wondering what could be the real problem.

 

 

Could you please help me out what authorization object needed in case you want to run Queries created in Fiori Custom Analytical query app as a business user ?

entry.content:
Hi Experts, 

 

We have a Standard fiori App "My Time Events" Activated and configured on our fiori launchpad, As a business requirment we want to hide the footer button "Balances". I know we have a approach of using UI5 Project Extension but we want to achieve it using Badi Extensions. 

Is there a way to hide the button using Badi Extenasion approach.

entry.title: SAP UI5: PDFViewer with flag isTrustedSource=true gives error
entry.content:
Hello, 

we have an application which uses PDFViewer with the property isTrustedSource="true". However the PDF does not load, instead I can see an error in the console saying "Error: Underlying iframe was not found in DOM.".  The application is running inside a Launchpad.

I already searched the forums, everyone is suggesting setting isTrustedSource to true, which we did. However the error is showing. Is there another cause which I can take a look at?

Thanks a lot in advance!

entry.title: SAP BTP Neo Environment: Problem calling iflow from SAP Fiori
entry.content:
Hi everyone
I developed an application in SAPUI5 in a Neo environment. Running the application from SAP Web IDE Full-Stack (version: 201119) works correctly, but when deploying it to SAP Fiori, I receive a 405 error.

SAP Web Ide full

 

It is evident from sap fiori that it returns status 405

It uses a destination with an OAuth2ClientCredentials, and neo-app.json and manifest.json are configured for destinations.

 

Any suggestions on how to resolve this error?

entry.title: Criticality on Table Card in Fiori Elements OVP
entry.content:
Hello Experts

I am currently working on a simple OVP Fiori Elements app and I came across an issue where criticality is not reflected on Table Cards.
I have a simple CDS View with all the required annotations, such as:

      @UI.lineItem: [{position: 10,
                     label: 'Due Date',
                     criticality: 'DueDateCriticality'}]
      DueDate,
      dats_days_between(DueDate,$session.system_date)                      as DaysOverdue,
      
      case
          when $projection.DaysOverdue > 0 then 1 // Late
          when $projection.DaysOverdue = 0 then 2 // Imminent
          else 3 // In the future
      end                                                                  as DueDateCriticality,


This works perfectly fine on List Report Fiori Elements:

but it does not work on OVP Table Card:

Can someone point me in the right direction please?

SAP Fiori Elements

entry.title: Table maintenance alternatives in S/4HANA on premise
entry.content:
Hi,

We are working on defining best practice guidelines for creating maintenance objects in S/4HANA on promise. Depending on complexity, there seem to be a few options:

  • Using a simple Table Maintenance View from GUI with a Fiori Launchpad tile .
  • Using the Fiori app “Custom Business Objects”, which generates a BOPF object in the background.
  • Creating a ‘Maintenance Object’ from Eclipse, which generates a RAP-based solution.

Since SAP provides the Custom Business Objects app, it could be a valid option, but RAP is the strategic direction.

I would appreciate recommendations or best practices on which approach to choose for both small/simple and more complex maintenance/configuration tables. No step-by-step instructions are needed; I am primarily looking for guidance on the preferred approach.

Thanks in advance!
